ClaimsList: C-diff has a 10 minute resting kill time
common inanimate allergens from cat and dog dander & dust mite matter
When used as directed, effective for 24 hours against Staphylococcus aureus & Enterobacter aerogenes bacteria
Kills SARS-COV-2 on hard non-porous surfaces
See EPA master label for full list of organisms and contact times
in a 1 minute soak in soft, medium and hard water hardnesses vs. the leading competitive professional brand
vs. a leading private label based on recommended dosage of 2 oz. per 10 gallon sink; average across three water hardnesses
Bacteria, Viruses†, Fungi and Mold and Mildew: Let stand for 5 minutes.

Then wipe with a cloth or paper towel. Kills Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Staphylococcus aureus, Salmonella enterica, Escherichia coli O157:H7, †Respiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV)§, †Influenza A H1N1§, †Human Coronavirus§, †Rotavirus, †Norovirus (Feline Calcivirus as surrogate),†Rhinovrus, Aspergillus niger and Trichophyton mentagrophytes.
when used per label instructions. C-Diff has a 10 minute kill time for the Ready to Use Comet Disinfecting Cleaner with Bleach Only.
